column5: Hey guys,  was watching the A channel news and caught a glimpse of something on the TV and once I got closer to the tv set I saw it was an OFC toque on the head of someone being asked something by the reporter.  It was down by the Barrie marina I think.  May I ask who that was?  just curious.
Wishin I was Fishin was on A channel the other day, but i dont think he wore an OFC hat http://mfile.akamai.com/10676/wmv/ondemand...-dbldigiths.asx
yep it might have been me, i dont own an OFC toque but i own a hat and i have been interviewd down there. i was on there the other night but just a replay of before.
Ya, I saw it too.  The OFC hat just glistening in the light of the camera, it was awesome  Joey
hows the fishin been down in the marina ??
